TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DispatcherHelper extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("Replace calls to APIs in this class with extensions for the Windows.System.DispatcherQueue type (see https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.system.dispatcherqueue).")]
[<System.Obsolete("Replace calls to APIs in this class with extensions for the Windows.System.DispatcherQueue type (see https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.system.dispatcherqueue).")>]

Docs.summary: This class provides static methods helper for executing code in UI thread of the main window.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task AwaitableRunAsync (this Windows.UI.Core.CoreDispatcher dispatcher, Action function, Windows.UI.Core.CoreDispatcherPriority priority = Windows.UI.Core.CoreDispatcherPriority.Normal);

<Extension()> Public Function AwaitableRunAsync (dispatcher As CoreDispatcher, function As Action, Optional priority As CoreDispatcherPriority = Windows.UI.Core.CoreDispatcherPriority.Normal) As Task
static member AwaitableRunAsync : Windows.UI.Core.CoreDispatcher * Action * Windows.UI.Core.CoreDispatcherPriority -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("This method should be replaced with dispatcherQueue.EnqueueAsync(function, priority). A queue can be retrieved with DispatcherQueue.GetForCurrentThread().")]
[<System.Obsolete("This method should be replaced with dispatcherQueue.EnqueueAsync(function, priority). A queue can be retrieved with DispatcherQueue.GetForCurrentThread().")>]

Docs.param: Dispatcher of a thread to run .
Function to be executed on the given dispatcher.
Dispatcher execution priority, default is normal.
Docs.summary: Extension method for . Offering an actual awaitable with optional result that will be executed on the given dispatcher.
Docs.remarks: If the current thread has UI access, will be invoked directly.

Docs.param: Synchronous function to be executed on UI thread.
Dispatcher execution priority, default is normal.
Docs.summary: Executes the given function on the main view's UI thread.
Docs.remarks: If the current thread has UI access, will be invoked directly.

Docs.param: Asynchronous function to be executed asynchronously on UI thread.
Dispatcher execution priority, default is normal.
Docs.summary: Executes the given -returning function on the main view's UI thread and returns either that or a proxy that completes when the one produced by the given function completes.
